def calculate_minimum_time(arr: list[int]) -> int:
    """"""
    n = len(arr)
    sor = 0
    ans = n
    st = set()
    for a in arr:
        sor ^= a
        if sor in st or sor == 0:
            ans -= 1
            st.clear()
            sor = 0
        st.add(sor)
    return ans

def calculate_minimum_time(arr: list[int]) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the minimum time required to turn all elements of the array into zeros using the specified operations.

    Parameters:
    arr (list[int]): The array of integers to be processed.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum time required to turn all elements of the array into zeros.
    """
    n = len(arr)
    sor = 1
    ans = n
    st = set()
    for a in arr:
        sor ^= a
        if sor in st or sor == 0:
            ans -= 1
            st.clear()
            sor = 0
        st.add(sor)
    return ans

def calculate_minimum_time(arr: list[int]) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the minimum time required to turn all elements of the array into zeros using the specified operations.

    Parameters:
    arr (list[int]): The array of integers to be processed.

    Returns:
    int: The minimum time required to turn all elements of the array into zeros.
    """
    n = len(arr)
    sor = 0
    ans = n
    st = set()
    for a in arr:
        sor ^= a
        if sor in st or sor == 1:
            ans -= 1
            st.clear()
            sor = 0
        st.add(sor)
    return ans
